patthana23.31:1.1_0: Naparittārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.31:2.1_0: Naparittārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.31:3.1_0: Naparittārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo parittārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.31:3.1_2: anantare samanantare ekavīsa, upanissaye ekavīsa, natthiyā vigate ekavīsa.
